title: Arsenal v Atlético Madrid: Champions League – live
summary: Diego Simeone's team is heading to the Emirates for an upcoming match. Scott Murray will provide minute-by-minute updates on the game. Follow along for the latest developments and insights.

title: Newcastle v Benfica, Villarreal v Manchester City and more: Champions League – live
summary: Yara El-Shaboury will provide live updates on goal scores from various European leagues. The coverage highlights key moments and developments as teams compete in the ongoing league stage. Stay tuned for the latest action and insights!

title: No plan for Trump-Putin meeting in ‘immediate future’, White House says – live
summary: The White House retracted President Biden's announcement of a meeting in Hungary. An official noted that Secretary Rubio and Foreign Minister Lavrov had a "productive call." This clarification suggests ongoing diplomatic discussions between the U.S. and Russia.

title: ChatGPT Atlas: OpenAI launches web browser centered around its chatbot
summary: A new AI-powered browser has been launched, centered around a prominent chatbot designed to enhance user experience. The browser aims to deliver a more personalized online interaction. This innovative approach is expected to transform how users navigate the web.

title: Grandchildren of Ruth Ellis, last woman to be hanged in UK, ask for pardon
summary: David Lammy is being urged to reconsider the 1955 case concerning the murder of Ellis, following new evidence suggesting he was previously abused by his partner. Advocates are calling for a reassessment of the circumstances surrounding the case. This development highlights the need to address domestic violence in historical legal contexts.
